title: Large-Scale: Blended Language Teaching Methodology Design Based on MOOCs: Strengthening Pre-Service/In-Service Teachers' Competencies

context.prior_knowledge: Basic language education theories and experience using digital devices
context.additional_context: Language pedagogy training combining MOOCs with offline practicums for pre-service and in-service secondary teachers

learning_goals: Learners can explain language education theories provided on the MOOC platform with a comprehension rate of over 80%.
Learners design and implement at least three types of language teaching activities using digital tools in a blended learning environment.
Learners improve their instructional design competencies by at least three levels based on formative assessment results.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
